entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:15 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 12:15 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
